notes: Disclaimer: In the event of a discrepancy between this course sequence and the official calendars, the calendars take precedence and are considered the authoritative source.
You must enroll in this activity each term until completed.
The course APA 6102 may be taken in the fall or winter term, as offered.

courses: APA6302 | Qualitative Research Methods in Sport, Physical Activity and Health OR APA6303 | Quantitative Research Methods in Sport, Physical Activity and Health

APA6102 | Selected Topics in Sport, Physical Activity and Health: Physiological Studies OR APA6103 | Selected Topics in Sport, Physical Activity and Health: Biomechanics OR APA6109 | Selected Topics: Motor Control and Learning
APA6101 | Quantitative Data Analysis in Sport, Physical Activity and Health
